summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a trunk sewer together with a stormwater overflow, to be known as The West Montlake Trunk Sewer Unit No. 2, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16107 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor; providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and adopting the maps, plans and specifications for such improvement.
